```{r tech variability as function of amp efficiency and biomass}
exampledf <- read.csv(here("/special_issue_manuscript/Data/gold_example_data.csv"))

biomass.ampeff.vs.techvar <- function(exampledf){
  exampledf
  
 bins(exampledf$abundance, target.bins = 3, minpts = 2)
  
    data.frame(exampledf,abundance_bin=cut(exampledf$abundance,as.numeric(quantile(exampledf$abundance)),include.lowest=TRUE))
      data.frame(exampledf, amp_bin=cut(exampledf$amf_ef,quantile(exampledf$amf_ef),include.lowest=TRUE))
  # cbins(exampledf$abundance, target.bins = 3, binct = 3)
  
  
  
}
```
